declarations.name: Pfv6CardBody
declarations.description: PatternFly Card Body Component A container for card body content. Can be used multiple times within a card to create multiple body sections with individual control over fill behavior.

members.name: filled
members.description:
Whether the body section should fill available height (flex-grow)
When 'true', the body will expand to fill available space.
When 'false', the body will only take up as much space as its content needs.

attributes.name: filled
attributes.description:
Whether the body section should fill available height (flex-grow)
When 'true', the body will expand to fill available space.
When 'false', the body will only take up as much space as its content needs.

declarations.name: Pfv6CardExpandableContent
declarations.description:
PatternFly Card Expandable Content Component

A wrapper for expandable card content (body and footer sections).
Visibility is controlled by the parent card's `expanded` state.

```html
<pfv6-card expandable>
<pfv6-card-title>Title</pfv6-card-title>
<pfv6-card-expandable-content>
<pfv6-card-body>Body content</pfv6-card-body>
<pfv6-card-footer>Footer content</pfv6-card-footer>
</pfv6-card-expandable-content>
</pfv6-card>
```

slots.description: Default slot for expandable content (typically pfv6-card-body and pfv6-card-footer)

declarations.name: Pfv6CardFooter
declarations.description:
PatternFly Card Footer Component

A wrapper for card footer content.

```html
<pfv6-card>
<pfv6-card-title>Card Title</pfv6-card-title>
<pfv6-card-body>Body content</pfv6-card-body>
<pfv6-card-footer>Footer content</pfv6-card-footer>
</pfv6-card>
```

declarations.name: Pfv6CardTitle
declarations.description: PatternFly Card Title Component A wrapper for card title content with optional semantic heading element. ```html Card Title Body content ```

members.name: component
members.description:
HTML element to use for the title wrapper
Allows semantic heading elements (h1-h6) or default div

attributes.name: component
attributes.description:
HTML element to use for the title wrapper
Allows semantic heading elements (h1-h6) or default div

declarations.name: Pfv6Card
declarations.description: PatternFly Card Component A card is a content container that displays entry-level informationâ€”typically within dashboards, galleries, and catalogs. Supports all PatternFly v6 Card features including: - Size modifiers (compact, large) - Variants (default, secondary) - Interactive states (selectable, clickable, disabled) - Expandable content - Full height layout - Plain styling ```html Card Title Card body content goes here Footer content ```

members.name: variant
members.description: Card variant - changes the visual style of the card

members.name: compact
members.description:
Modifies the card to include compact styling
Should not be used with `large`

members.name: large
members.description:
Modifies the card to be large
Should not be used with `compact`

members.name: fullHeight
members.description: Modifies the card so that it fills the total available height of its container

members.name: plain
members.description: Modifies the card to include plain styling (removes border and background)

members.name: clickable
members.description: Makes the entire card clickable/actionable

members.name: selectable
members.description: Makes the card selectable with a checkbox

members.name: selected
members.description: Whether the card is currently selected (when selectable=true)

members.name: clicked
members.description: Whether the card is currently clicked (when clickable=true)

members.name: expandable
members.description: Makes the card expandable with a toggle

members.name: expanded
members.description: Whether the card is currently expanded (when expandable=true)

members.name: disabled
members.description: Disables the card (when selectable or clickable)

members.name: actionsNoOffset
members.description: Removes the offset/padding before actions in the card header

members.name: toggleRightAligned
members.description: Positions the expand toggle button on the right side instead of the left

members.name: _hasHeader
members.description: Check if the card has header content (images, icons, or actions)

slots.name: header-icon
slots.description: Card header icon (positioned before title, e.g. for expandable cards)
Default slot for card sub-components (pfv6-card-title, pfv6-card-body, pfv6-card-footer, pfv6-card-expandable-content)

cssParts.name: header-content
cssParts.description: The card header content container (images and title)

declarations.name: Pfv6Checkbox
declarations.description: PatternFly Checkbox Component A checkbox is used to select a single item or multiple items, typically to choose elements to perform an action or to reflect a binary setting. Supports all PatternFly v6 Checkbox features including: - Checked/unchecked/indeterminate states - Required indicator - Disabled state - Validation states - Label positioning (before/after input) - Standalone mode (no visible label) - Description and body content - Form integration ```html Subscribe to newsletter I agree to the terms Disabled option Required field Select all Enable notifications You will receive email notifications Label first ```

members.name: internals
members.description: ElementInternals for form association and ARIA attributes

members.name: id
members.description: Unique identifier for the checkbox (required for accessibility)

members.name: disabled
members.description: Whether the checkbox is disabled

members.name: required
members.description: Whether the checkbox is required

members.name: valid
members.description: Whether the checkbox state is valid

members.name: labelPosition
members.description:
Position of the label relative to the checkbox
- 'end': Label after checkbox (default)
- 'start': Label before checkbox

members.name: accessibleLabel
members.description:
Accessible label for the checkbox (use when no visible label)
Maps to aria-label via ElementInternals

members.name: name
members.description: Name attribute for form integration

members.name: value
members.description: Value attribute for form integration

members.name: focus
members.description: Focus the checkbox input

members.name: blur
members.description: Blur the checkbox input

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the checkbox (required for accessibility)

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Whether the checkbox is disabled

attributes.name: required
attributes.description: Whether the checkbox is required

attributes.name: valid
attributes.description: Whether the checkbox state is valid

attributes.name: label-position
attributes.description:
Position of the label relative to the checkbox
- 'end': Label after checkbox (default)
- 'start': Label before checkbox

attributes.name: accessible-label
attributes.description:
Accessible label for the checkbox (use when no visible label)
Maps to aria-label via ElementInternals

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Name attribute for form integration

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Value attribute for form integration

events.name: change
events.description: Dispatched when the checkbox state changes

slots.description: Optional description text below the label

slots.name: body
slots.description: Optional body content below the description

cssProperties.description: Grid gap between checkbox and label/content
